solution.text:
\(\frac{_{{j*k+1}}_}{_{k}_}=_{{trunc(((j*k+Decimal(1))/k),4)}}_\)
\(\frac{_{{j*l+1}}_}{_{l}_}=_{{trunc(((j*l+Decimal(1))/l),4)}}_\)
\(\frac{_{{j*k+1}}_}{_{l}_}=_{{trunc(((j*k+Decimal(1))/l),4)}}_\)
\(\frac{_{{j*l+1}}_}{_{k}_}=_{{trunc(((j*l+Decimal(1))/k),4)}}_\)
Therefore, the rational numbers \(\frac{_{{j*k+1}}_}{_{k}_}\) and \(\frac{_{{j*l+1}}_}{_{l}_}\) lie between \(_{j}_\) and \(_{{j+1}}_\).
